Subject: How can I have elitism for each species?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=467342474; y=d3BFURane_SE26Pn0mgzSOc5RTVmlDoFhd5OnmOEoIw-5URmg34i
X-Yahoo-Profile: jeffreyclune

Hello all-

In Jason's HyperNEAT C++ code,  I am trying to enforce that the champion of
each species is preserved.

I have a population size of 15 (small, I know) and a SpeciesSizeTarget of 3
(to have 5 orgs per species).

I set smallestSpeciesSizeWithElitism to 1.0 (so every species should have
elitism), and then I rate orgs like so

Org/Fitness

A - 1000
B - 500
C - 500
All the rest 1

Presumably A, B, and C should be preserved in the next generation, but that
does not happen. I only get A.

I figured maybe elitism only applied to mutation and not crossover, so I set
MutateOnlyProbability to 1.0, but that did not solve the problem.

Any ideas?




Best regards,
Jeff Clune

Postdoctoral Fellow
Hod Lipson's Computational Synthesis Laboratory
Cornell University
jeffclune@...
www.msu.edu/~jclune
